message: Let's start fair. I propose we split the money 60/40 in my favor. We can adjust later if you'd prefer.
I think a 55/45 split is fairer.  It's closer to even, and we can still adjust in later rounds if needed.
Let's be reasonable.  A 50/50 split seems like the most fair way to divide the money.  We can't keep going back and forth - we're losing value with each round!
